name: Crappy Bird (mushrombrother)
description:
This is crappy bird. A knock off of flappy bird!

The pillars spawn late, and that's why this game is called Crappy Bird (but actually I don't know how to fix it) 

Controls

Fly:

W key, ↑ key, or Click

Fall:

Stop holding fly button

This is my second game ever, and it is goddamn crappy. Enjoy!

Restart:

Reload the page (I know i suck)
